div.div: Dear Families,
Tonight Israel will begin celebrating the State’s 72nd birthday. This is a big holiday for the majority of the country and we prepared some special activities for our students.
Tomorrow in Hebrew class, students in all grades will “visit” places in Israel, learn about them and participate in a quiz for a chance to win prizes.
There are also optional experiences that you can join at home:
1. FlipGrid – Password: Chaverim. It’s a platform where students from our schools connect with their peers in Israel.
2. Escape Room challenge for middle schoolers (proudly prepared by “shinshinim” – youth volunteers from Israel in our LA school – Lashon).
We hope you are staying healthy,
Jon, Emily, Jonathan, Valerie, Kim & Elly (Hebrew Public Senior Leadership Team)

div.p: Today, on Israel Remembrance Day, we remember those who protected Israel. Because of those brave men and women, we can now celebrate Israel’s independence. Todah Raba!

div.class: flex_column av_one_fourth flex_column_table_cell av-equal-height-column av-align-top av-zero-column-padding avia-builder-el-26 el_after_av_one_fourth el_before_av_one_fourth column-top-margin

div.div: Who loves our teachers and school staff? We do!
As we prepare to celebrate our school staff in the coming weeks, we’d love to include you.
Record and send a video telling us what you love about your school. It could be your favorite subject, a special friend you made in class or your favorite teacher.
Whatever you love about HLA, we’d love to hear about it.
We will share these videos with our staff during Teacher Appreciation Week and we can’t wait to see what you come up with!
Please submit all videos to info@hebrewpublic.org.

avia-image-container av-styling- avia-builder-el-29 el_before_av_textblock avia-builder-el-first avia-align-center

div.div: Wherever you are in the world, join us on Facebook LIVE to CELEBRATE ISRAEL with MATISYAHU (an American singer and musician) and a GLOBAL DANCE PARTY!
Tune in between: 11:30 AM to 5 PM EDT for:
Cooking with Israeli Celebrity Chef Haim Cohen – שף חיים כהן
Celebrating the Israeli VIBE- Culture, Fashion and Technology with our partners at Vibe Israel
Winning Together: 72 Years in Motion -Sports, Community and Achievements, brought to you by Jewish Community Centers of North America (JCCs), JCC Global and Maccabiah – Maccabi World Union
Jewish Federations of North America‘s Worldwide Celebration of Israel’s Independence Day
Matisyahu – Exclusive Performance for The Jewish Agency from his home studio
Global Dance Party with גלגלצ, Israel’s Leading Radio Station
